Furious Calm.name: Furious Calm
Furious Calm.flavor: With a heavy strike, you settle into your fury, allowing you to tap reserves of endurance.
Furious Calm.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.

Lethal Ancestor Rage.name: Lethal Ancestor Rage
Lethal Ancestor Rage.flavor: An ancestor wreathes you in power, strengthening your attacks and invigorating you.
Lethal Ancestor Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the lethal ancestor. Until the rage ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls with at-will attack powers and rage strike. In addition, when you hit any enemy with an at-will attack power or rage strike, you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Strength modifier.

Deliberate Rampage.name: Deliberate Rampage
Deliberate Rampage.flavor: Your previous devastating blow grants you an opening to strike again, and a chance to use your rage for invigoration
Deliberate Rampage.trigger: You score a critical hit with a barbarian attack power and havenâ€™t used Rampage this round
Deliberate Rampage.effect: In place of making a melee basic attack as a result of Rampage, you can use furious calm, even if you have already used that power during this encounter.
